# Text file that contains GMTSAR region information for each site
# To be used in conjunction with get_site_dims.sh and HTCondor InSAR Workflow
# organized by site
# first line is -R in lat/lon
# second line is -R in UTM
# third line is UTM zone
# 
# Elena C Reinisch 20180327
#
# SITE 5 LETTER CODE NAMES
#
# brady - Bradys Hot Springs, NV, USA
# maule - Laguna del Maule, Chile
# mcgin - McGinness Hills
# dcamp - Don Campell
# cosoc - Coso, CA
# tungs - Tungsen
# emesa - East Mesa
# fallo - Fallon, NV
# milfo - Milford, UT
# fawns - Fawnskin
# forge - Forge, UT
# 
# POLYGON INFORMATION
# order: W E S N
